topic.title: Advanced Features
topic.shortdesc: In-depth look at custom scripting, API integration, and developer tools for the SmartHome Hub.

body.p: The Advanced Features section is tailored for power users and developers who want to customize and extend the capabilities of the SmartHome Hub.

The Hub offers API endpoints that allow developers to integrate with third-party services. You can send and retrieve data in JSON format, enabling seamless interaction with home security systems, weather services, and more. Refer to the Developer Guide for API documentation and sample requests.

For enhanced protection, you can configure advanced security settings, including custom firewall rules and two-factor authentication. Security logs and alerts can be reviewed through the appâ€™s dashboard.

Optimize system performance by monitoring resource usage and configuring load balancing for multiple connected devices. Advanced users can tweak system parameters to better suit their network conditions and usage patterns.
This section provides the technical depth and flexibility required to fully exploit the SmartHome Hub's capabilities and integrate it with broader home automation ecosystems.
